attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we pay the BBC Licence Fee to over paid BBC presenters! first Jonathan Ross and now Jemery Clarkson -- It's about time the BBC SACKED these people for their public bad taste remarks, who take their high Salaries from our Licence Fee --- Who do these so called presenters think they are?
If the BBC will not do it then why should we have to pay them!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
